title: Nine states challenge federal mandate that disabled people receive care in community
description: A lawsuit from nine states seeks to undercut a federal mandate that people with disabilities receive care in their communities.
content: A lawsuit from nine states seeks to undercut a federal mandate that people with disabilities receive care in their communities.
